H0.text: Reducing the amount of heartburn with the use of herbal teas is the action that represents the use of technology to solve a problem.

H1.text: Answering mathematical equations with the use of computers represents the use of technology to solve a problem.

H2.text: Bringing down body temperature with the use of a hand fan is an action that represents the use of technology to solve a problem.

H3.text: Increasing the supply of fish with the use of fish farms is an action that represents the use of technology to solve a problem.

A4.text: Recent advances in computer vision have further improved automated monitoring, with vision-language models capable of identifying and classifying multiple fish species in underwater environments using temporally aggregated features.

A5.text: Biofloc technology is also used to simultaneously improve water quality and generate bacterial biomass as food for the cultured animals.
